## Editor class

The main editor component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Editor extends LitElement 
```
**Extends:** LitElement

## Example

Example usage:

```html
<webmate-editor src="/path/to/my/page.json"></webmate-editor>
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_editorContext](./editor.editor._editorcontext.md) |  | EditorContextInterface |  |
|  [\_onPageChanged](./editor.editor._onpagechanged.md) |  | (\_page: ObservableInterface&lt;PageInterface&gt;) =&gt; void | <p>Event handler for when the page changes in the page manager. It updates the editor context and requests an update.</p> |
|  [\_pageManager](./editor.editor._pagemanager.md) |  | PageManager |  |
|  [onSave](./editor.editor.onsave.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Sets the <code>isSaved</code> property of the editor context to <code>true</code>. This method can be used as an event handler for a "save" button or similar functionality in the editor. |
|  [src](./editor.editor.src.md) |  | string | The URL of the page to load. |
|  [styles](./editor.editor.styles.md) | <code>static</code> | import("lit").CSSResult |  |
